items.name: Crown of the Inward Eye
enchantMods: Energy Blades have 15% increased Attack Speed
implicitMods: Socketed Skill Gems get a 90% Cost & Reservation Multiplier
explicitMods: 21% increased maximum Life, Mana and Global Energy Shield
flavourText: Divinity is not the only path to enlightenment.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 16 to 248 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
7% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
explicitMods: Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill you use to hit enemies yourself. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines.

Supported Skills have 69 to 103 added Cold Damage
Supported Skills have 15 to 23 added Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

19% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Normal or Magic Enemy in Area
99% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Rare or Unique Enemy in Area

taken Spell Damage Recently

Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which significantly lowers your maximum Energy Shield to transform your equipped weapons into Swords formed from that energy. Casting the spell again removes the buff. Requires a Non-Bow weapon. This skill cannot be triggered.

Energy Blades have minimum Lightning Damage equal to 2% of Energy Shield, plus 12
Energy Blades have maximum Lightning Damage equal to 40% of Energy Shield, plus 235
Two Handed Energy Blades have 70% more Lightning Damage

There is nothing that cannot be changed.

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf

It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.
